basics.name: Trevor Allen
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Trevor hails from the west coast. While his work focuses on front end and mobile development, he is also an accomplished backend engineer with experience in several prominent languages and a love for all things web. A dedicated life long learner.

work.summary: Aquicore is a SaaS and IoT company that provides Real-time commercial energy management metrics, reporting and automation.
highlights: Built a portfolio level report highlighting critical budget and performance information (used by customers such as Facebook, Walmart and Underarmor)
Leveled up our application's user experience by overhauling many parts of the UI with material design and Aria accessibility compliance.

work.summary: Knucklepuck Media is an SEO and digital marketing startup focused on high-quality customer centric work.
highlights: Built launched and maintained https://www.teenrehabcenter.org - growing visitors from nothing to thousands a week in less than a year
Managed server and DNS infrastructure for clients and internal projects
Implemented many of the project planning and management policies still in use by the company

work.summary: Asheville Yoga Center is the largest yoga campus in Asheville. they teach over 100 weekly classes and train hundreds of people every year from all over the US
highlights: Developed a web API to pull scheduling information for classes and trainings into their website
Migrated entire company from Godaddy email hosting to Google apps
moved web portfolio from hostgator/cpanel to custom php/nginx configuration on Digital ocean - increasing site speeds by upwards of ~70%

work.summary: The Wired Mouse is a complete IT solutions provider located in Asheville, North Carolina
highlights: Worked with clients ranging from individuals to More Space Place building websites, plugins and web services
pushed for more modern and mobile friendly development practices, increasing the development team's effectiveness and increasing business

volunteer.summary: Assisted with simple maintenance and cleaning of the computer hardware used in the server and user areas of the building.

skills.name: Web Development
keywords: Node, PHP, Java, Go and Python
